summary: INTERMITTENTLY SHIFT DISPLAY AND DOOR LOCKS NOT WORKING.  WHEN SHIFTING FROM REVERSE TO DRIVE, THE TRUCK WOULD BUCK.  LOCKS WOULD NOT UNLOCK WHEN PUT INTO PARK.  CHECK ENGINE LIGHT KEPT COMING ON.  CODE P0708 IN SYSTEM FOR PARK/NEUTRAL SWITCH.  REPLACE PARK/NEUTRAL SWITCH FOR A TOTAL OF $416.48.  *TR
